title: DONT TRUST ANY LINKS THAT SAY ITS LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
body: I was just sent this link from a friend that was hacked. He was sent this by a friend and thought that it was a legit sight. Upon arriving at the site it asks for your username, password and what skin you would like and obviously one of the skins they were offering was Pax Tf and at that point i knew it was fake. For all you people that think these sites are real please think again. Pax tf is a rare skin and i doubt anybody would hand it out in a giveaway so please be cautious

replies.body:
"yolasite" didn't give it away? And why would Riot use such a messy URL to begin with?

Don't take wrong my intentions, I'm thankful for the warning.
